sentences.en: ...sheltering from a sudden downpour of rain.
sentences.cn: …躲避一场突如其来的瓢泼大雨。

sentences.en: A downpour like this never lasts long here this time of the year.
sentences.cn: 这个季节这样的大雨不会下很久的.

sentences.en: A downpour of rain put out the children's bonfire.
sentences.cn: 一阵大雨把孩子们的营火都浇灭了.

sentences.en: A heavy downpour interrupted the football match.
sentences.cn: 一场骤雨中断了这场足球赛.

sentences.en: I was caught in a downpour.
It was the heaviest downpour ever recorded.
sentences.cn: 那是有史以来最大的一场暴雨.

sentences.en: It's wonderful after the terrible downpour last night.
sentences.cn: 昨晚下了一场大雨之后,天就变好了.
我的天, 雨真大 啊 !

sentences.en: On seeing the downpour, she belted ( up ) her raincoat.
sentences.cn: 一看到倾盆大雨, 她就用皮带束好雨衣.

sentences.en: She was drenched by the sudden downpour.
sentences.cn: 她被那场突然下的倾盆大雨淋得湿透.

sentences.en: The seeds that had been sown were almost completely washed away by a sudden downpour.
sentences.cn: 已经播下的种子几乎被一场突如其来的暴雨全冲走了.

sentences.en: The sudden downpour put a chill into the picnickers.
sentences.cn: 突然落下的倾盆大雨使野餐的人感到扫兴.

sentences.en: Today's football match has been washed out by a sudden downpour.
sentences.cn: 今天的足球赛因一场突然降临的大雨而取消了.

sentences.en: We arrived just when the sky had cleared after a downpour.
sentences.cn: 我们到达时正是雨过天晴.

sentences.en: We got caught in a torrential downpour.
sentences.cn: 我们遇上一场瓢泼大雨.

sentences.en: We were having a picnic, when suddenly there came a downpour , which was rather a fly in the ointment.
sentences.cn: 当我们正在举行野餐的时候, 忽然大雨倾盆, 未免大煞风景.

trans.tran_en: a lot of rain that falls in a short time
